channel.title: Need portforwarding help!
channel.description: i need help portforwarding my router so i can host :\ i've tried 2 different kind of guides and idk... my router is a Linksys WRT150N so if u can help me pleaseee reply :s

item.title: Need portforwarding help!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“reverce, post:3, topic:287446”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=380077.msg2857488#msg2857488 date=1246974552]
Sorry, we do not help with portforwarding questions, although you can use your external IP instead of a No-IP host.
[/quote]
you shoud read the rules, we can only help with server related questions,
yust google around and u wil find some usefulle guides, keep trying it wil work :d[/quote]
That’s what I just told him.

Read full topic
